name: 30% ruling - minimum salary threshold
description: Highly skilled migrant at minimum salary threshold of €50,000

sources.description: Calculated with 30% ruling: only 70% (€35,000) is taxable
sources.notes: Taxable: €35,000, Tax: €12,939.50, General credit: €2,691, Labour credit: €5,283, Net ≈ €40,400
